author: Ciara Farmer For Mailonline
title: Stephanie Davis larks around with ex Jeremy McConnell | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Stephanie looked incredibly slender in a chic red coat with a belted middle, while she paired the look with tight black leggings complete with sheer panels. She wore a long top over the trousers while boosting her diminutive height with a pair of staggering knee-high boots. She was also boasting the fabled new mother's glow with her smile highlighting her happy look. Jeremy stuck to his typical uniform of a shearling coat and eye-wateringly tight jeans paired with stylish desert boots - making for his usual edgy finish. Cheeky! And just one day later the duo put on a cheeky display as they climbed into a car with broad grins extending across their faces in delightful scenes Taking to Twitter on Wednesday, it seems life as a father has enlightened him wholly as he took to Twitter to pen to his 393,000 followers: 'Woken up to the best birthday Iv ever had'. Atop his excitement at fatherhood, Jeremy is reportedly set to play happy families with Stephanie further as sources told The Sun that he is making a permanent move to Liverpool: 'He has no plans to return to Dublin for the foreseeable future.' News first surfaced last week that Jeremy had jetted to Liverpool from his native city, after which he sent an adoring Tweet about the weekend as he penned: 'Had an amazing few days, feel blessed'. Birthday boy! Taking to Twitter on Wednesday, it seems life as a father has enlightened him wholly as he took to Twitter to pen to his 393,000 followers: 'Woken up to the best birthday Iv ever had' Amazing! News first surfaced last week that Jeremy had jetted to Liverpool from his native city, after which he sent an adoring Tweet about the weekend as he penned: 'Had an amazing few days, feel blessed' Stephanie certainly seemed contented that little Caben is building a relationship with his dad as she too took to the microblogging site to write: 'A Sunday well spent brings a week of content'. Jeremy has reportedly prolonged his visit, as a source told The Sun: 'Jeremy is still in Liverpool with Stephanie at the moment. They’re using this time to get to know each other again away from the cameras and things are going well. 'It’s been an emotional couple of days for them both but they’re beginning to see light at the end of the tunnel. Jeremy was keen not to miss out on any more time with Caben and Stephanie agrees it’s important for him to be there.'
